definitions.title: n.pl.indecl.
definitions.body: (a) twenty (ancient pl. of [[עֶשֶׂר]] Prä:BAS i. 376; NH = BH; Ar. 9i4ruwna; As. ešrâ; Sab. [[עשרי]] Hom:Chrest. 48; Eth. 9sr4: Aram. [[עשרין]], 9esriyn; Nab. [[עשרין]]);—

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: n.pl. precedes Ge 32:15, Ge 32:15, Ge 32:16, 2Ch 3:3 + 6 t.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: c. units, usu. 20 + (c. [[וְ]]) unit + n.s. Ju Jdg 10:2, Jdg 10:3, 1Ki 14:20 + 58 t. (incl. 20 + 1 * 1000, etc., 27 t.); n. om. Jos 15:32 + 2 t. pred.; less oft. unit + 20 + n.s. Ge 11:24, Ex 38:24, Nu 8:24 (all P) + 27 t.; unit + 20 + [[בָּאַמָּה]] Ez Eze 40:21, Ex 26:2, Ex 36:9 (both P).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: c. hundreds, 20 usu. foll.; sq. n.s. 1Ki 9:14, Ge 6:3, De 31:2 + 7 t.; n. om. 2Ch 3:4, Ezr 2:32 = Ne 7:35; 20 + 100 (n. om.) Nu 7:86.
20 alone, ´[[בִּשְׁנַת ע]] in the twentieth year 1Ki 15:9 + 4 t.; n. om. Nu 10:11 + 3 t.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ns. + 20 + unit Hag 1:15, 2Ch 7:10 +; ns. + unit + 20 Ex 12:8; [[בִּשְׁנַת]] + 20 + unit 1Ki 16:10, etc.—Vid. reff. sub [[עֶשֶׂר]].
